hypothesis_content.title: Weekend Gas Dips → Monday ETH Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: When ETH gas (Sunday 00:00-06:00 UTC) drops below 35 gwei while weekend ETH price change is neutral (±1.5%), ETH will outperform BTC by 2-4% during Monday's Asian-European trading overlap (03:00-09:00 UTC).
hypothesis_content.rationale: Low weekend gas enables accumulation and smart contract interactions that manifest as Monday momentum when institutional liquidity returns, particularly during Asia-Europe overlap.
entry_conditions: Sunday ETH gas (00:00-06:00 UTC avg) < 35 gwei
Weekend ETH price change (Fri close to Sun open) between -1.5% and +1.5%
BTC regime == NEUTRAL at Sunday 23:59 UTC
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: ETH underperforms BTC on Monday despite favorable weekend gas conditions.
